meanings.def: for a short period of time but not permanently
examples: I'm changing my email address but for the meantime you can use the old one.

meanings.def: in the period of time between two times or two events
examples: My first novel was rejected by six publishers. In the meantime I had written a play.
The next programme starts in five minutes; in the meantime, here’s some music.

meanings.def: in the period of time between two times or events
examples: I'll contact them soon. Meantime don't tell them I'm back.
Efforts to establish a ceasefire are increasing. Meantime the bloodshed continues.
